interactive-REPL/01-intro-REPL.title: üß≠ Interactive Python mode

interactive-REPL/04-assignment-operators.description: Learn how Python stores data in variables and how to use shortcut operators to update values quickly. Perfect for beginners working in the REPL.

interactive-REPL/05-expressions-REPL.description: Learn how Python expressions combine values, variables, and operators to produce results‚Äîthe foundation of all computations. Perfect for REPL practice!

interactive-REPL/06-operator-precedence-.title: Operator precedence
interactive-REPL/06-operator-precedence-.description: Learn how Python decides which operations to evaluate first and how parentheses control the order of execution.

interactive-REPL/07-data-types-REPL.title: üß© Understanding Data Types
interactive-REPL/07-data-types-REPL.description: Learn how Python stores, organizes, and understands information using data types the foundation for every Python program.

interactive-REPL/08-conditional-logic-RE.description: Learn how Python makes decisions using if, elif, else, and logical operators‚Äîall interactively in the REPL.

interactive-REPL/10-loop-patterns.description: Learn practical looping tricks like enumerate(), zip(), and comprehensions to make your Python code cleaner, shorter, and more expressive all through hands-on REPL practice.

interactive-REPL/12-math-module-REPL.description: Explore Python's built-in mathematical functions and the powerful math module including square roots, trigonometry, logarithms, constants like œÄ and e, and more.

interactive-REPL/13-ascii-REPL.title: ASCII

interactive-REPL/16-lists-REPL.title: Lists [`list`]

interactive-REPL/17-dictionaries-REPL.description: Learn how Python dictionaries store key‚Äìvalue pairs efficiently, support dynamic updates, iteration, and nested data structures.
